info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN CATAWBA AND WEST CENTRAL IREDELL COUNTIES UNTIL 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Statesville, or near Catawba, moving northeast at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Troutman, Catawba, Lake Norman State Park, Claremont, Lookout Shoals Lake, Lake Norman, Scotts, Sherrills Ford and Bandys. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: The combination of gusty winds and saturated soil conditions will cause scattered trees and power lines to fall. Seek shelter inside an interior room.
